name: Streets of Chance
description:
Gangs are out for blood! Will luck be on your side?

This is a short game I started as part of a game jam earlier this year, that I decided to go back and finish.

Jam Theme: Roll of the dice.

Attack enemies using the dice in the stage. The number the dice lands on will determine the strength of the attack. Try to take out as many enemies as you can to build up your score!

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Attack: Left click

This is just a practice game, but feedback is welcome.

munro font from tenbytwenty.com

Spear Swooshing sound effect from freesfx.co.uk
